EmailTemplate.name: DOL Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: Dept of Licensing – Invoice attached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please see attached your invoice {!BGBK__Bill__c.Name} for .
We must receive your payment within 30 days of receipt of this notification. Pay your balance with our new online system! • Go to [URL]. • Follow the directions on your invoice for payment requirements,
Need help? Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov
